intro: Cyathostemma yunnanense, commonly known as the Yunnan cyathostemma, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweed and related species. The plant is characterized by its hairy stems and showy, clustered flowers that are typically yellow or orange in color. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its ornamental value and limited distribution, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
